Texts.Eng: +20% Chance to Poison monsters on hit.
120% Base Power while dual-wielding One-Handed Weapons.

An upgrade to Double Jump, press [Space] to launch yourself in a direction of your choosing, leaving a cloud of smoke behind that disorients enemies. Disoriented enemies are slowed and do less damage. Defaults to a backwards launch.
Cannot use Two-Handed Ranged Weapons or Magic Weapons.

Press [F] to transform into a poison-immune Spike Sphere. Left click while transformed to shoot out a ring of poison clouds (Damage scales with Dexterity). Hold Right Click while transformed to decrease your Hunger Bar to regenerate Health and Energy.

Press [G] (Bind [G] in your Controls) to toggle a toxic field that inflicts enemies with a weakening poison. These enemies take more poison and bleed damage. Drains energy while active, and is toggled off when no energy remains.

Press [G] (Bind [G] in your Controls) to toggle an ability that increases Physical and Poison Resistance and grants Knockback Immunity. Drains energy while active, and is toggled off when no energy remains.
While your Food Meter is filled at least halfway, gain +20% Poison Resistance.
